keywords: The Butcher's Guide to Well-Raised Meats
name: Cook the Book: Fleisher's Secret Chicken Rub
description: The secret's out! This spice blend includes punchy powdered onion, garlic, cayenne, paprika, and dried green herbs (thyme, sage, and oregano). Fleisher's special blend accentuates the fine chicken-y flavors without covering them up by over-seasoning.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the salt, sage, garlic powder, onion flakes, paprika, thyme, black pepper, oregano, and cayenne. Rub the dried herbs between your palms to crush them as you add each to the mixture. This rub will keep in an airtight container for 6 months. Shake or mix well before using.
